product_name: Nescafe Sunrise Coffee Couple Pack-200g Jar with 2 Coffee Mugs Valentines Gift Pack: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: This is awesome in low budget. Thank to Amazon to provide in low price.
Cups r small in size but coffee is very big n good quantity loved the coffee. Go for it as it's price is reasonable.
Instead of mugs it should be called cups. Small size. More like tea cups. Build quality is good (clay craft branded).

reviews.review_title: Better than normal nescafe packs , worth it.
reviews.review_body: After using it for 2 months i am writing this review and rather than purchasing the normal nescafe go for this sunrise special pack as there is something special ingredients added in this to make it more special make it delicious, Also i have to say the cups provided with the packare are really of the good quality with proper embarking of nescafe logo on it and the colour of cups are really sweet which just looks really fantastic.So go for this product without any hesitation.

The price is justified because the pack comes with two cups and a large coffee jar. This was my first time trying this Sunrise coffee and I totally loved it! To be honest, I purchased this pack just for the cups. I had no idea the jar would be this huge. But after taking a sip itself, I started loving this coffee and now I'm glad the coffee will last for long, given the size of the jar and amount of coffee.

taste is awesome.gives good feel and energy after drinking. the problem is, it makes you highly addictive. one day you drink, next day you dont, then the whole day you will be sleeping and dont have clear mind to do any task. few years back i dint get such feelings because of filter coffees. now a days , coffee creates more anxiety, depression, when you drink regularly. for two weeks stop drinking coffee, then those fear,anxiety feeling disappers but that two weeks after stopping coffee will make you lazy, sleepy and mind not working

Its a value for money product, since its a nescafe brand their is no doubt about the taste. In this pack there r 2cute coffee cups. Cups r not too big like mugs neither too small, size is proper. I like it.
